title: Game bugsplats after champion select
body:
pretty much the title, every time I try to start a game of any type, the timer hits 0 zero on champ select then my game bugsplats and I am unable to reconnect, just constant bugsplat.

I recently changed my monitor but I have tried everything that has been suggested in the forum to my knowledge, can anyone give me some help?

replies.body: I solved it when it happened to me by changing the game to a windowed mode. Worked for me. Once I bought a new monitor full screen worked again. No idea if that's your problem but it was mine. All started one day with a Windows 10 update.

This error usually happens when something is failing to render the game, like bad drivers.  Go through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot and get back in game.  I doubt your monitor would cause this, but you can always try swapping it for another to rule out that possibility.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i have also had this error, and it only happens when i use my normal monitor. when i use my second it tends to work fine.
